titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John Cowper Powys Collection
titlestmt.author: by Diane J. Ducharme

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday November 29, 2018 at 04:12
profiledesc.descrules: translation missing: en.enumerations.resource_finding_aid_description_rules.beinecke manuscript unit archival processing manual

did.unittitle: John Cowper Powys collection

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The collection consists of miscellaneous letters by John Cowper Powys.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Ongoing collection of documents acquired by gift and purchase from various sources.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The John Cowper Powys Collection is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John Cowper Powys Collection. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This register is updated periodically. For information on material added to the collection since the last update, please consult the Public Services desk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
This listing encompasses accessions of single manuscripts and small groups of manuscripts pertaining to John Cowper Powys acquired by gift and purchase from various sources by the Beinecke Library. Materials acquired prior to January 1995 have been arranged in Series I, Letters
, which consists of letters by John Cowper Powys and is alphabetically arranged by recipient. Materials acquired since January 1995 are located in Series II, Additions since January 1995
, and are listed in accession order.

did.unittitle: Letters
Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Ben Abramson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 20cm.
ALS containing news of Alyse Gregory.
With envelope.
With: TLS from Ben Abramson to Norman
[Holmes] Pearson, 1953 May 13.
1 item (1 leaf) ; 26cm.
"Sent to Rare Book Room 27 N[ov] 1961."

did.unittitle: Letters : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to John Badham

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
17 items.
15 ALS and 2 autograph postcards
concerning Powys' health, work on Rabelais and Dostoievsky , and
the birth of Badham's son.
With: 15 envelopes.
With: 3 autograph postcards, signed,
by P[hyllis] Playter to John Badham,
1945 Sep-Oct.
Purchased in 1991.

did.unittitle: Letters : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to George X. Basarab

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
15 items.
14 ALS and 1 AL containing biographical
information on Powys and Phyllis
Playter and discussion of his literary
tastes.
ALS of 1947 Jun 3 includes pen-and-ink
caricature of Playter reading Sartre
to Powys.
With: 14 envelopes (one letter on
aerogram form).
Purchased in 1995.

did.unittitle: Letter : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Juanita [Berlin]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 23 cm.
ALS.
Purchased in 1991.

did.unittitle: Letter : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Juanita [Berlin]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 23 cm.
ALS.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letters : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Laura Coster

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
64 items.
64 ALS containing biographical and
personal information about Powys
and commentary on Sappho, the English
Romantics, and other authors.
With: 63 envelopes.
Purchased in 1990.

did.unittitle: Letters : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Ormond Coulam

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
11 items.
11 ALS discussing Powys' works,
Coulam's 1936 visit to Wales and his
subsequent marriage.
With: 9 envelopes.
Purchased in 1990.

did.unittitle: Letters : Merionethshire, North Wales, to Curtis Freshel

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
29 items.
29 ALS discussing Powys' writings,
views on European politics of the
late 1930s, religious beliefs, and
reading.
Letter of 17 Jul 1952 in the hand of
Phyllis Playter.
With: 8 envelopes.
Purchased in 1994.

did.unittitle: Letter : 148 Waverly Place, New York City, to Mrs. Curtis Freshel

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 22 cm.
ALS to Mrs. Curtis Freshel concerning
a lecture tour.
Purchased in 1994.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Mrs. G. M. Green

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 20 cm.
ALS.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merioneth[shire], North Wales, to Terence Greenidge

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 21 cm.
ALS concerning publication prospects
of Owen Glendower .
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1991.

did.unittitle: Letters : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Evelyn Hardy

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 ALS concerning Hardy's writing on
Swift and Hardy.
Purchased in 1964.

did.unittitle: Postcard: Corwen, Merioneth[shire] to Huw? Menai

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 14 cm.
Autograph postcard signed.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letter : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to F. G. Walker

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 20 cm.
ALS concerning Llewellyn Powys.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1991.

did.unittitle: Letters : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Lily M. Walsh

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 ALS containing biographical
information.
With: 2 envelopes.
With: 2 ALS from Phyllis Playter to
Lily Walsh concerning the last
illness and death of Powys. Both
with envelopes, 1962, 1963.
Purchased in 1990.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Richard Heron Ward

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 22 cm.
ALS containing news of Powys and
his associates.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1993.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merioneth[shire], North Wales, to Richard Heron Ward

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 21 cm.
ALS.
Purchased in 1993.

did.unittitle: Letter : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales to [John Foster White?]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 20 cm.
ALS.
With: envelope addressed to "Miss
L. M. Walsh," postmarked 1958 Jun 15.
With: TL (carbon) from Phyllis Playter
to John Foster White, concerning the
death of Powys, 1963 Jul 3.
Purchased in 1990.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merioneth[shire], North Wales, to "Francis"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 20cm.
AL.
Purchased in 1990.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merioneth[shire], North Wales, to "My dear and most gallant and generous friend"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (4 leaves) ; 20cm.
AL (possibly incomplete).
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, N[orth] Wales, to "My dear friend"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 21 cm.
ALS discussing the writing of Henry
Miller.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merioneth[shire], North Wales, to "my dearest Nephew"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (1 leaf) ; 20 cm.
ALS.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to "my dear friend"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 21 cm.
ALS.
Purchased in 1992.

did.unittitle: Additions Since January 1995
HOUGHTON, CLAUDE, 1889-
Letters to John Cowper Powys : Savage Club, London

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
6 items.
6 ALS discussing personal news,
friends and family members, and
authors including Henry Miller,
James Hanley and Theodore Powys.
Letter of 10 Oct 1960 mentions an
enclosed sonnet (not present).
With: 6 envelopes. (One envelope,
postmarked 23 Dec 1959, not
accompanied by a letter.)
Purchased in 1995.

did.unittitle: POWYS, JOHN COWPER, 1872-1963
Letters to Nettie Packer : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
6 items.
6 ALS discussing personal news,
libraries and their users, London
during World War II, and authors
including Edgar Allan Poe and
Aristophanes.
With: a pen and ink sketch map of
Corwen and the route to Powys's
house.
With: 6 envelopes.
Purchased in 1996.

did.unittitle: Letters to Peter Wiener : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 brief ALS commenting on Wiener's
arrival with his collection and
an introduction to Powys's cousin
Trevor Moillet.
With: 2 envelopes.
Purchased in 1996.

did.unittitle: Letters to Bill Bax : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
25 items.
25 ALS discussing personal news,
friends and family members, World
War II and fascism, Powys' writings,
and authors including Homer,
Sophocles, George Borrow, and
Henry James.
With: 3 incomplete letters from
Powys to Bax and 1 ALS from Phyllis
Playter to Bax.
Purchased in 1996.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to M. J. Dewar

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 leaves) ; 20 cm.
ALS in response to an autograph
request.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letters to Mrs. Robert Mantner : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 ALS concerning Powys' health
and daily events.
With envelopes.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letters : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Mr. Disspain

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 ALS concerning Disspain's request
for an autograph.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letters : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Reid Crowell

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
5 items.
5 ALS discussing Crowell's poetry
and that of his mother, Grace Noll
Crowell.
With: ALS from Powys to Grace Noll
Crowell, 1958 Sep 12, and 3
typescript carbons of letters from
Reid Crowell to Powys.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letter : Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Sheridan Van Dolan

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 l.) ; 20 cm.
ALS praising Van Dolan's poetry
and discussing other authors.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letters : to Mrs. Esther MacMillan

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
5 items.
5 ALS concerning her search for
several of his books and daily
news.
With: TLS to Macmillan from Bertram
Rota, Ltd., 1950 May 18; and ALS
to Macmillan from Francis Powys,
1952 Jan 18.
Purchased in 1997.

did.unittitle: Letter : 439 W. 21 [Street], N.Y., to Mr. Davenport

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item (2 L.) ; 21 cm.
ALS thanking him for an invitation
to the theater but sending regrets.
Purchased in 1998.

did.unittitle: Letters : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Sven Berlin

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
2 items.
2 ALS, one containing reminiscences
of the Powys' brothers lives and
friends in New York City.
Purchased in 1998.

did.unittitle: Letter : Blaenau-Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, North Wales, to Mr. W. Disspain

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 item (1 L.) ; 21 cm.
ALS concerning reading and the history of Guy Fawkes night. Purchased in 1998.

did.unittitle: Letters : to Eleanor Johnson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
10 items.
7 ALS discussing reading,
books by the Powys brothers
and family matters.
Accompanied by: TLS to Johnson
from G. Arnold Shaw, 1936
Feb 9, concerning her collecting
of Powys first editions; ALS
to Johnson from "Hattie," n.d.,
concerning a debate between Powys
and Bertrand Russell on "Is Marriage
a Failure?" and ALS to Johnson from
"Pat,"1937 Jan 25.
With: envelopes.
Purchased in 2001.

did.unittitle: POWYS, THEODORE FRANCIS, 1875-1953
"The Key of the Field" : AMS

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 v. ; 23 cm.
Notebook containing fair copy
of short story on 36 numbered
pages (rectos only).
Signature at end.
Binding: cloth backed marbled
boards.
Purchased in 2001.

did.unittitle: "The Dewpond" : AMS

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item ; 26 cm.
Exercise book containing manuscript,
corrected and signed, of short story
on 31 numbered pages (rectos only).
Signature at end.
Binding: gray paper wrapper.
With: ALS and envelope to Douglas
Clayton concerning "The Dewpond,"
1929 Sep 12.
Purchased in 2001.

did.unittitle: POWYS, JOHN COWPER, 1872-1963
Letter : 7 Cae Coed, Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to George Moor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item ; 20 cm.
ALS saying that he has enjoyed
reading Moor's masque, "The
Trial of the Jewelled Peacock"
and hopes it will be performed.
With: envelope.
Purchased in 2001.

did.unittitle: Letter : 7 Cae Coed, Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to "Paulette, John and Michael"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item; 20 cm.
ALS thanking them for Christmas
wishes.
Purchased in 2002.

did.unittitle: Letter : 7 Cae Coed, Corwen, Merionethshire, North Wales, to "My dear Lady"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p:
1 item; 20 cm.
ALS thanking her for sending him
Huxley's The Art of Seeing. Purchased in 2003.
